ComicInfo.Penciller: Darren Douglas,Greg Staples,John Burns,Neil Googe,Patrick Goddard
ComicInfo.Summary:
SHOOT FROM THE LIP! The Grinders go in for the kill, courtesy of artist Dylan Teague, in Savage: Grinders by Pat Mills and Patrick Goddard in this week’s 2000 AD! Also inside this week’s edition of the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic: time is running out in Judge Dredd: Dark Justice by John Wagner and Greg Staple; we go genre mad in Survival Geeks: Steampunk’d by Gordon Rennie, Emma Beeby, Neil Googe, and Gary Caldwell; into the belly of the beast in The Order by Kek-W and John Burns; and is this the final stop in Tharg’s 3riller: Station to Station by Eddie Robson and Darren Douglas?
Cover: Dylan Teague
Judge Dredd - Dark Justice (Part Ten) (John Wagner - Greg Staples)Survival Geeks - Steampunk'd (Part Three) (Gordon Rennie - Emma Beeby - Neil Googe)Tharg's 3rillers Presents Station To Station (Part Three) (Eddie Robson - Darren Douglas)The Order (Part Ten) (Kek-W - John Burns)Savage Book 9 - Grinders (Part Ten) (Pat Mills - Patrick Goddard)
